original_text: The Lord hath taken away thy judgments, he hath cast out thine enemy: the king of Israel, even the Lord, is in the midst of thee: thou shalt not see evil any more.
korean_text: 여호와가 네 형벌을 제거하였고 네 원수를 쫓아냈으며 이스라엘 왕 여호와가 네 가운데 계시니 네가 다시는 화를 당할까 두려워하지 아니할 것이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord hath taken away thy judgments
he hath cast out thine enemy
the king of Israel, even the Lord
is in the midst of thee
thou shalt not see evil any more
